Block.Name: Subtract (-)
Block.Description: Substracts value in2 from value in1.

Block.Name: Constant (Float)
Block.Description: Defines float constant.

Block.Name: Moving Average
Block.Description: Calculate moving avarage with defined lenght.

Block.Name: Counter
Block.Description: Counts number of positive or negative edges.

Block.Name: Zero Crossing
Block.Description: Detects if the input signal cross the zero value.

Property.Name: Edge
Property.Description: Defines if possitive, negative or both zero corssings should be detected.

Block.Name: Constant (Int)
Block.Description: Defines integer constant.

Block.Name: Constant (Float)
Block.Description: Defines float constant.

Block.Name: Switch (Int)
Block.Description: Switch for integer variables. If control is 0 the output is equal to input 1 otherwise output is equal to input 2.

Block.Name: Switch (Int)
Block.Description: Switch for integer variables. If control is 0 the output is equal to input 1 otherwise output is equal to input 2.

Block.Name: Constant (Int)
Block.Description: Defines integer constant.

Block.Name: Mux (Int)
Block.Description: Int multiplexer. Creates array from scalar inputs.

Block.Name: Feature Computation
Block.Description: Calculates selected features of input signal. The value are calculated from the N last samples.

Input.Name: reset
Input.Description: Reset signal. Rising edge trigers the reset.

Output.Name: max
Output.Description: Maximum value of the input signal.

Output.Name: min
Output.Description: Minimum value of the input signal.

Output.Name: mean
Output.Description: Mean value of the input signal.

Output.Name: var
Output.Description: Variance value of the input signal.

Property.Name: Buffer Length
Property.Description: Define length of buffer used for features calculation.

Block.Name: Switch (Int)
Block.Description: Switch for integer variables. If control is 0 the output is equal to input 1 otherwise output is equal to input 2.

Block.Name: Greater than (>)
Block.Description: Checks if in1 is greater than in2. Returns 1 if the condition is true, 0 otherwise.

Block.Name: Peak Detector
Block.Description: Detects peaks on input signal.

Property.Name: Peak
Property.Description: Defines if possitive, negative or both peaks should be detected.

Property.Name: Threshold
Property.Description: Signal with amplitude less than Threshold is ignored.

Block.Name: Peak Detector
Block.Description: Detects peaks on input signal.

Property.Name: Peak
Property.Description: Defines if possitive, negative or both peaks should be detected.

Property.Name: Threshold
Property.Description: Signal with amplitude less than Threshold is ignored.

Block.Name: Switch (Int)
Block.Description: Switch for integer variables. If control is 0 the output is equal to input 1 otherwise output is equal to input 2.

Block.Name: Magnitude
Block.Description: Calculates magnidude of the input vector.

Block.Name: Acceleration [g]
Block.Description: Retrieve the accelerometer data.

Block.Name: [Sensor Hub]
Block.Description: Sensor Hub provides links to sensor and algorithms in order to retrieve data from them.

Property.Name: Data Rate
Property.Description: Defines the sensor's and algorithm's data rate in Hz. If accelerometer or gyroscope is selected as data rate source, the closest higher available output data rate (ODR) is selected.

InitCode.Line: Sensor_Hub_Init(%Data Rate Control%, %Data Rate%, %Accelerometer Full Scale%, %Gyroscope Full Scale%);

Block.Name: Zero Crossing
Block.Description: Detects if the input signal cross the zero value.

Property.Name: Edge
Property.Description: Defines if possitive, negative or both zero corssings should be detected.

Block.Name: Value
Block.Description: Displays up to eight integer values.

Input.Name: in
Input.Description: Input data to display. The input data size has to match with number of values.

Property.Name: Number of Values
Property.Description: Defines number of values to display. Value must be from 1 to 8.

Block.Name: Logic Analyzer
Block.Description: Displays up to eight logic values in real-time chart. The X-axis represents time, Y-axis is logic state (0 or 1).

Input.Name: in
Input.Description: Input data to display (y-axis value). The input data size has to match with number of channels.

Property.Name: Number of Channels
Property.Description: Defines number of channels to plot. Value must be from 1 to 8.

Block.Name: Value
Block.Description: Displays up to eight integer values.

Input.Name: in
Input.Description: Input data to display. The input data size has to match with number of values.

Property.Name: Number of Values
Property.Description: Defines number of values to display. Value must be from 1 to 8.

Block.Name: Graph
Block.Description: Graph. Displays up to six real-time curves. The X-axis represents time, Y-axis is value.

Input.Name: in
Input.Description: Input data to plot (y-axis value). The input data size has to match with number of curves.

Property.Name: Number of Curves
Property.Description: Defines number of curves to plot. Value must be from 1 to 6.
